scripts.dev: concurrently --names "convex,frontend,backend" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npx convex dev" "npm run dev --workspace=dillydally-frontend" "npm run dev --workspace=dillydally-express"
scripts.build: npm run codegen && turbo build && npm run verify-build
scripts.verify-build: echo '=== DEBUG: Current directory ===' && pwd && echo '=== DEBUG: Finding all dist directories ===' && find . -type d -name 'dist' -not -path './node_modules/*' 2>&1 && echo '=== DEBUG: Finding index.html ===' && find . -name 'index.html' -not -path './node_modules/*' 2>&1 && echo '=== DEBUG: Checking root dist directory ===' && ls -la dist/ 2>&1 && echo '=== DEBUG: Full path ===' && (pwd && ls -la dist/ 2>&1) || echo 'Failed to find dist'
scripts.start: concurrently --names "convex,frontend,backend" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npx convex dev" "npm run preview --workspace=dillydally-frontend" "npm run start --workspace=dillydally-express"
